We-Haul is a full-service Junk Removal, Bin Rental & Demolition company, founded in 2007.

Need help getting rid of junk at your home, business or construction site? Get relief with quick, fair and reliable hauling services. We will give you a hand in digging through the clutter and removing unwanted junk from your property or job site. Our experienced staff accompanied by our maintained fleet and new trucks will pick up your trash at a competitive rate without compromising service. All junk is disposed of at appropriate transfer stations or donated to charities. Only a small portion of what we remove will be brought to a dump or landfill.

Whether you’re renovating or working on a new build, we’ve got you covered with scheduled bin rentals. Get peace of mind with reliable same-day bin switches (if scheduled before 10 am) so the crew can keep working.

Looking to get your renovation started? Or you just want to tear down that ugly, old garage you’ve been staring at the last few years? We do all types of demo work from interior walls and floors to tearing down old sheds and garages. If you are even thinking about getting some interior & exterior demolition work done, call us first! We will provide you with a written quote that is sure to beat any competitor. We are fully licensed and insured! Our services include a bin rental.

Our crew are fully-vetted, respectable and reliable. We will show up at your location and give you a FREE ON-SITE ESTIMATE before we start. If you like our quote, we will begin the job. All you have to do is relax and we will do all the dirty work.
